column4: there are newer MythTV 0.19 packages available in someone's private repository.  Worked great for me.
: do you remember what they were?
http://hamsta.net/mythtv/files/dapper/ is the respository, use "deb  http://hamsta.net/mythtv/files/dapper ./" in your sources.list and read here:  http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=186747
